title: Heaven's Burning (1997) (Russell Crowe)
description:
After a botched bank job, a gang takes a hostage, Japanese girl on the run from arranged marriage, and escapes. Their wheelman saves the girl from them and the two go on the run with the cops, the gang and her psycho father on their tail.

I have included 2 SRT files, one I have modified to show only non-English speaking parts (In the main folder), the other is the full subtitles untouched (Extract with winrar, or 7zip.

Screens:
 <a href="
http://bayimg.com/KaopOAAFP" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://bayimg.com/KaopOAAFP</a>

This movie also stars Colin Hay (lead singer of Men At Work)

Enjoy.
